casebody.data:
EX PARTE THE NEW-JERSEY RAIL ROAD COMPANY. Matter of Practice. Mr. Molleson,

in behalf of the company moved for writs of Certiorari, to bring into this Court, the proceedings of certain commissioners in assessing damages, in three cases against the company.

*394The reason assigned for the application, was, that excessive damages had been assessed by the commissioners. By the Court.

Let the writs be allowed.
